channel.title: Uncivil
channel.description: America is divided, and it always has been. We're going back to the moment when that split turned into war. This is Uncivil: Gimlet Media's new history podcast, hosted by journalists Jack Hitt and Chenjerai Kumanyika. We ransack the official version of the Civil War, and take on the history you grew up with. We bring you untold stories about covert operations, corruption, resistance, mutiny, counterfeiting, antebellum drones, and so much more. And we connect these forgotten struggles to the political battlefield we’re living on right now.
channel.itunes:subtitle: A new history podcast from Gimlet Media, where we go back to the time our divisions led to war. We ransack America's past, and bring you stories left out of the official history. Hosted by Jack Hitt and Chenjerai Kumanyika.
channel.itunes:author: Gimlet

item.title: The Raid
item.description: A group of ex-farmers, a terrorist from Kansas, and a schoolteacher attempt the greatest covert operation of the Civil War.
item.itunes:author: Gimlet
item.itunes:subtitle: A group of ex-farmers, a terrorist from Kansas, and a schoolteacher attempt the greatest covert operation of the Civil War.

item.title: Give Us a Call
item.description:
We want to hear from you! Do you have a family story from the Civil War? A myth you've seen on social media you want busted? Let us know! 

Call 347-395-5078 and leave us a voicemail with your name, story, and the best way to reach you.

item.title: Coming Soon
item.description:
America is divided, and it always has been. We're going back to the moment when that split turned into war. This is Uncivil: Gimlet Media's new history podcast, hosted by journalists Jack Hitt and Chenjerai Kumanyika. We ransack the official version of the Civil War, and take on the history you grew up with. We bring you untold stories about covert operations, corruption, resistance, mutiny, counterfeiting, antebellum drones, and so much more. And we connect these forgotten struggles to the political battlefield we’re living on right now.

For early access, check out uncivil.show
